originalText.text: A better doctor and his staff you will never find anywhere!!  I am so, so fortunate to have Dr. Simone and his staff help me through my journey with cancer.  I'm not sure I could have made it without them!!  Words just don't  really feel enough to express my gratitude.   All angels minus the wings!!  I'm so thankful.

text.text: A better doctor and his staff you will never find anywhere!!  I am so, so fortunate to have Dr. Simone and his staff help me through my journey with cancer.  I'm not sure I could have made it without them!!  Words just don't  really feel enough to express my gratitude.   All angels minus the wings!!  I'm so thankful.

originalText.text:
I had a telemarketing with Dr. Simone before it was determined that I was eligible for treatment at the Proton Center.  At that time, Dr. Simone spent approximately 40 minutes explaining to my family how the treatment worked and how it is different.  This was before I was even accepted.

Throughout the treatment, he was fantastic.  He was able to explain a lot about my overall treatment to me aside from just the radiation.  He did a great job with radiation. What a doctor!  He was just so good at explaining everything, it’s unbelievable.

Throughout the treatment, he was fantastic.  He was able to explain a lot about my overall treatment to me aside from just the radiation.  He did a great job with radiation. What a doctor!  He was just so good at explaining everything, it’s unbelievable.

originalText.text: Being told that I had lung cancer was devastating. Being at the NY Proton Center with Dr. Simone gave me the optimism to believe that I could beat this. The entire staff made me feel comfortable and had incredible compassion and understanding. Dr. Simone is so knowledgeable and kind. From our first meeting I knew he was very special. I would also like to mention, Dixie, Dr. Simone’s nurse. She responded very quickly to any questions or concerns during and even after my therapy concluded.

originalText.text: Dr. Simone is a great doctor.  He treated my husband Bob He made him feel very comfortable and explained everything in detail.  The proton center is amazing and the staff is wonderful

originalText.text: A great staff providing high quality care. Dr. Simone is outstanding in his bed manners and in explaining the whole treatment process with its pros and cons
